ValidationRule.description: Jun 14: Validation rule disabled based on suggestion form Sara Parent. Rule not used by GTO team and not required for GCE team.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Cancelled') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Done') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Expired') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Completed') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Approved') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed/Collected') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed with Credit') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Approved') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Denied') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Partially Accepted') ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Sub_Class__c , 'Electrical') , ISPICKVAL( Sub_Class__c , 'Mechanical') , ISPICKVAL( Sub_Class__c , 'New Spare') ), $RecordType.Name != 'Technical Issue', $Profile.Name != 'Portal API User - RFQ (US)', $Profile.Name != 'Portal API User RO Automation', $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name != 'Honeywell System Administrator', $Profile.Name != 'DeniedPartyScreeningAPIUser' , $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Case cannot be closed if the Sub Class value is "Electrical," "Mechanical" or "New Spare" for quality reasons. Please update the Sub Class.
